self_text: I'm trying to find an old texture pack, and it was really popular, but I can't remember what it's called! It had a black sun in the sky and I think it also changed the world spawn area into something like a jungle temple... If anyone knows please help!

title: Is there a way to get rid of all the jingles when I use an item or craft?
self_text: So like every time you throw something, break blocks, craft items it makes a noise and it's driving me insane. is there a way to turn that off in the settings?  I'm on Java edition.  Also I don't want to remove sounds completely just these noises specifically.

title: Can you tell me the location of all the hidden structures?
self_text: I'm trying to find a village and an ocean monument but i can't seem to find them after many hours of searching. Is there any way that i can know where they are located at using commands or mods? (i don't want to use chunkbase)
